page.title: 14ISSUES Essex/Cambs Border
page.content: {GOOD POINTS People live in this rural area because they enjoy peace and quiet, friend- liness. This area is rural but has good communications - road and rail links. They prefer to bring up their children in the country. Most people are very contented living in the area. {BAD POINTS Some rural homes have unreliable electricity and during winter a few isolated houses can be cut off from main roads and services. There is no village shop and very little public transport for school leavers into towns. Only 3 buses per day to Cambridge. There are no recreational facilities for teenagers. Noise of farm machinery at anti-social hours is sometimes annoying.
